frontmatter.title: Python Autospeccing
frontmatter.description: While Iâ€™m looking for a way to test my function that has a pymysql query, I stumble upon a code snippet with @mock.patch('simple.pymysql', autospec=True). So I took my time to know how this stuff works. Apparently Python has a very good documentation about it. This article summarizes what I understand about Python Autospec.
